MetaChat
  • API
  • View page source

API

Preprocessing: pp

pp.MetaChatDB([species])

Extract metabolite-sensor pairs from MetaChatDB.

pp.LRC_unfiltered(adata[, LRC_name, ...])

Function for identifying LRC candidate (unfiltered) points based on the quantile of the marker gene.

pp.LRC_cluster(adata[, LRC_name, ...])

Function for performing local density clustering on candidate points.

pp.LRC_filtered(adata[, LRC_name, ...])

Function for assigning LRC points after locak density clustering.

pp.compute_costDistance(adata[, LRC_type, ...])

Function for computing LRC-embedding cost distance based on graph construction.

Tools: tl

tl.metabolic_communication(adata[, ...])

Function for inferring spatial metabolic cell communication.

tl.summary_communication(adata[, ...])

Function for summary communication signals to different metabolites set.

tl.communication_flow(adata[, ...])

Function for constructing metabolic communication flow by a vector field.

tl.communication_group(adata[, ...])

Function for summarizng metabolic MCC communication to group-level communication and computing p-values by permutating cell/spot labels.

tl.communication_group_spatial(adata[, ...])

Function for summarizng metabolic MCC communication to group-level communication and computing p-values based on spaital distance distribution.

tl.summary_pathway(adata[, database_name, ...])

Function for summarizng MCC pathway pattern given specific sender group and receiver group.

tl.communication_responseGenes(adata, adata_deg)

Function for identifying signals dependent genes

tl.communication_responseGenes_cluster(...)

Function for cluster the communcation DE genes based on their fitted expression pattern.

tl.communication_responseGenes_keggEnrich([...])

Function for performing KEGG enrichment analysis on a given list of response genes.

Plotting: pl

pl.plot_communication_flow(adata[, ...])

Function for plotting spatial metabolic cell flow.

pl.plot_group_communication_chord(adata[, ...])

Plot chord diagram for group-level MCC.

pl.plot_group_communication_heatmap(adata[, ...])

Plot heatmap diagram for group-level MCC.

pl.plot_communication_responseGenes(df_deg, ...)

Plot smoothed gene expression of the detected metabolic cell communication response genes.

pl.plot_group_communication_compare_hierarchy_diagram(...)

Plot hierarachy diagram for comparing group-level MCC between two conditions.

pl.plot_MSpair_contribute_group(adata[, ...])

Plot heatmap diagram for comparing contribution.

pl.plot_communication_responseGenes_keggEnrich(...)

Barplot for results of KEGG enrichment by MCC response genes

pl.plot_summary_pathway([ms_result, ...])

Function to plot a Sankey diagram summarizing the metabolic cell communication pathways.
